last_episode_to_air.name: Mankind’s Biggest Builds
last_episode_to_air.overview: Richard explores elements that engineering projects have in common. And, he reveals how the challenges get bigger when something is built big!

name: Richard Hammond's Big
overview: Richard Hammond embarks on a global adventure to explore the world’s biggest structures and machines and discover how engineers build, maintain and use them.

episodes.name: World's Biggest Car Factory
episodes.overview: Richard explores Volkswagen's giant car plant in Wolfsburg, Germany. He checks out its futuristic technology and discovers how this mega-factory works!

episodes.name: Super Galaxy Plane
episodes.overview: Richard takes flight aboard the US Air Force's biggest cargo plane: The C-5M Super Galaxy. Climbing inside its inner workings he learns why it's a record breaker.

episodes.name: Austria's Mega Dam
episodes.overview: Richard explores one of the world's biggest man-made engineering projects: the Kölnbrein Dam, which can hold back an incredible 200 million tonnes of water!

episodes.name: Mega Ship
episodes.overview: Richard joins the crew of one of the biggest moving objects on earth, the Marie Maersk container ship, on her continuous 28,000-mile voyage from Asia to Europe.

episodes.name: World's Longest Railway Tunnel
episodes.overview: Richard ventures 2km beneath the Alps into the world's longest underground railway connection, the Brenner Base Tunnel, riding some giant machines!

episodes.name: Super Stadium
episodes.overview: Richard explores the huge Tottenham Hotspur Football Stadium in London. He explores a pitch that splits and rolls away and takes a terrifying walk on the stadium roof!

episodes.name: Tallest Building on Earth
episodes.overview: Richard visits the world's tallest building: the Burj Khalifa in Dubai. His vertical mission includes climbing the biggest lightening conductor on earth!

episodes.name: Gulf Oil Platform
episodes.overview: Richard takes a helicopter ride out to one of the most remote places on earth: the Appomattox production platform in the Gulf of Mexico.

episodes.name: Mankind’s Biggest Builds
episodes.overview: Richard explores elements that engineering projects have in common. And, he reveals how the challenges get bigger when something is built big!
